item.title: CVE-2024-1063|2024-01-30T09:20:26.210Z -- Appwrite -- Appwrite
item.description: Appwrite <= v1.4.13 is affected by a Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) via the '/v1/avatars/favicon' endpoint due to an incomplete fix of CVE-2023-27159.
